explains: adj. 熙熙攘攘的，忙乱的
v. 四下忙碌；使（人沿某方向）匆忙地走；繁忙（bustle 的现在分词）
wordGroup: hustle and bustle 熙熙攘攘，忙碌
bustle about 忙碌；东奔西跑

sentences.en: The street is bustling with noise and excitement.
This district is getting more and more prosperous and bustling.
The marble entrance hall, piled dizzily with bonbons and cakes, was as crowded and bustling as a railway station.
sentences.cn: 大理石门厅里堆满了令人眼花缭乱的糖果和蛋糕，像火车站一样拥挤、熙熙攘攘。
